pages.text: The Vampiric Poppet transfers damage taken by the user to the bound entity at the cost of durability.$(br2)Ironically, this does not seem to work for $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$().$(br2)Vampiric Poppets do not work in $(l:bewitchment:tools/poppet_shelves)Poppet Shelves$().
